00043 //Sample Name Experiment Name Gene External Id ProbeSet Id Allele 1 Allele 2
00044 //001-000505 96dev_27_001-000505 ABCB1 MDR1_A-44G 367417 A G
00045 const TittmColumnDefinition GTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[] = { // column_name, empty_ok, index, valid_regex
00046   { std::string("Sample Name"),     0,  0, std::string(".*"), NULL },
00047   { std::string("Experiment Name"), 0,  1, std::string(".*"), NULL },
00048   { std::string("Gene"),            0,  2, std::string("^[A-Z\\d]+$"), NULL},
00049   { std::string("External Id"),     0,  3, std::string(".*"), NULL  },
00050   { std::string("Assay Id"),        0,  4, std::string("^(?:[_\\-\\w\\d]*\\d+)$"), NULL },
00051   { std::string("Allele 1"),        0,  5,
00052     std::string("^(?:[ACGT0]+)|(?:INS|Ins|DEL|Del|NC|PRA|NoCall|PossibleRareAllele|\\-)$"), NULL },
00053   { std::string("Allele 2"),        1,  6,
00054     std::string("^(?:[ACGT0]+)|(?:INS|Ins|DEL|Del|NC|PRA|NoCall|PossibleRareAllele|\\-)$"), NULL },
00055 };

00057 /*****************************************************************************/
00058 /**
00059  * GenotypeTableModel::GenotypeTableModel
00060  * Synopsis:
00061  *
00062  * DMET2: TsvFile constructor.
00063  *
00064  * This is a single instance class where only one of these should ever
00065  * be in existence:
00066  *
00067  * genotype data file -> genotype table model.
00068  *
00069  * A quick glance at the column headers defined for this table shows
00070  * that the schema for this table looks nothing like what's in a CHP
00071  * file header.
00072  *
00073  * A decision was made early on that the only data to be used for DMET3
00074  * translation with the CHP file would be a subset of the DMET2 data.
00075  * Therefore the DMET2 table format was left in place.
00076  *
00077  * This table is the only object to stream data. This model then is the
00078  * closest to being a data access object. The transfer object is simply the
00079  * rows (m_rows) and the "readNextExperiment" accessor is the data
00080  * access method. This is unlike other "data access objects" using the
00081  * "TranslationInputTsvTableModel" where all data is read into memory
00082  * at construction.
00083  *
00084  * The business object that consumes this data access / transfer object
00085  * is the "TranslationTable" business object. The "TranslationTable" object
00086  * creates chromatid call sets from the genotype data transfered.
00087  *
00088  * When this object is constructed, no data is read in. To access
00089  * data use the "readNextExperiment" accessor and the next
00090  * experiment's worth of data will be read in, albiet from
00091  * a DMET2 genotype short report file or a DMET3 CHP file.
00092  *
00093  *
00094  *
00095  * @param rte - the single instance RunTimeEnvironment which contains options
00096  * @param genoFileName - the input file to read in.
00097  * @param gotm - the single instance of the genotype override file table model
00098  */
00099 /*****************************************************************************/
00100 GenotypeTableModel::GenotypeTableModel(const RunTimeEnvironment &rte,  const std::string &genoFileName, GenotypeOverrideTableModel *gotm) :
00101     TranslationInputStreamTableModel(rte, genoFileName, GTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS,
00102                                      (sizeof(GTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS) / sizeof(GTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[0])), true, GT_EXPERIMENT_INDEX, GT_GENES_INDEX, GT_PROBE_SET_INDEX, gotm)
00103 {
00104 
00105 
00106   return;
00107 
00108 }
00109 // end GenotypeTableModel::GenotypeTableModel

00113  * GenotypeTableModel::GenotypeTableModel
00114  * Synopsis

00116  * DMET3 CHP constructor to coalesce the GenotypeTableModel with the
00117  * DMET2 files. See the TSV constructor for a complete discussion.
00118  *
00119  * @param rte - RunTimeEnvironment which contains options
00120  * @param gotm - single instance of the genotype override table model
00121  *
00122  */
00123 /*****************************************************************************/
00124 GenotypeTableModel::GenotypeTableModel(const RunTimeEnvironment &rte,  GenotypeOverrideTableModel *gotm) :
00125     TranslationInputStreamTableModel(rte, GTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS,
00126                                      (sizeof(GTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS) / sizeof(GTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[0])), gotm)
00127 {
00128 
00129   return;
00130 
00131 }
00132 // end GenotypeTableModel::GenotypeTableModel

00135 /**
00136  * GenotypeTableModel::describeVerboseExperimentGene
00137  * Synopsis:
00138  *
00139  * Run time debug routine that can be invoked with various verbose levels.
00140  * ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES is the default level.
00141  *
00142  * @param rte       - run time environment
00143  * @param overrideLevel  - ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES by default,
00144  *                    otherwise the ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM level to output
00145  * @returns - void
00146  */
00147 /*****************************************************************************/
00148 void GenotypeTableModel::describeVerboseExperimentGene(const RunTimeEnvironment & rte, ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM overrideLevel)
00149 {
00150 
00151   if (!overrideLevel && (rte.m_currentVerbosity < ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES)) {
00152     return;
00153   }
00154 
00155   std::stringstream msgSStr;
00156 
00157 
00158   ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM outLevel = overrideLevel ? overrideLevel : rte.m_currentVerbosity;
00159 
00160   if (m_geneName.empty()) {
00161 
00162     msgSStr <<  "describeVerboseExperimentGene: no experiment gene data has been read yet." << endl;
00163 
00164   }
00165 
00166   else {
00167 
00168     msgSStr << "describeVerboseExperimentGene: " << m_experimentName;
00169     msgSStr << " " << m_geneName << endl;
00170 
00171     for (int row = 0; row < m_rows.size(); row++) {
00172       msgSStr << getRowAsString(row) << endl;
00173 
00174     }
00175   }
00176 
00177   Verbose::out(outLevel, msgSStr.str());
00178 
00179   return;
00180 }
00181 
00182 //end GenotypeTableModel::describeVerobseExperimentGene

00185 /**
00186  * getGeneRowSize:
00187  * Synopsis:
00188  *
00189  *   Returns the number of rows in the experiment m_rows table for one gene.
00190  * Rows are guaranteed to be in gene order.
00191  *
00192  * @params gene - the gene std::string to test.
00193  *
00194  * @return - The number of gene related rows, 0 if the gene doesn't exist.
00195  */
00196 /*****************************************************************************/
00197 int GenotypeTableModel::getGeneRowSize(const std::string & gene)
00198 {
00199 
00200   if (m_geneRowIndex.count(gene) == 0) {
00201     return 0;
00202   }
00203 
00204   return m_geneRowIndex[gene].size();
00205 
00206 }
00207 // end GenotypeTableModel::getGeneRowSize
00208 /*****************************************************************************/
00209 /*****************************************************************************/
00210 /**
00211  * GenotypeTableModel::getGeneRow:
00212  * Synopsis:
00213  *
00214  *   Returns index std::map from gene row to experiment row index.
00215  *
00216  *
00217  * @return - the row integer, -1 if the gene or row do not exist.
00218  */
00219 /*****************************************************************************/
00220 int GenotypeTableModel::getGeneRow(const std::string & gene, int row)
00221 {
00222 
00223   if ((m_geneRowIndex.count(gene) == 0) ||
00224       (m_geneRowIndex[gene].size() <= row)) {
00225     return -1;
00226   }
00227 
00228   return m_geneRowIndex[gene][row];
00229 
00230 }
00231 // end GenotypeTableModel::getGeneRow
00232 /*****************************************************************************/
00233 /*****************************************************************************/
00234 /**
00235  * GenotypeTableModel::_validateGenotypes:
00236  * Synopsis:
00237  *
00238  * Helper function used one time by GenotypeTableModel::getNextExperiment.
00239  * Broken out for readability.
00240  *
00241  *   Validate that the experiment genotype corresponds to either the reference
00242  *  or one of the variant bases in the translation table.
00243  *
00244  *
00245  *
00246  *
00247  *
00248  * @param rte         - the single instance run time environment
00249  * @param ttm         - the single instance translation table model
00250  * @param probeSetId  - the probeSetId in question
00251  * @param base1       - allele
00252  * @param base2       - allele
00253  */
00254 /*****************************************************************************/
00255 static void _validateGenotypes(RunTimeEnvironment & rte,
00256                                const TranslationTableModel & ttm,
00257                                const std::string & probeSetId,
00258                                const std::string & base1,
00259                                const std::string & base2)
00260 {
00261 
00262   std::map< std::string, std::vector< int >  >::const_iterator itSVI;
00263 
00264   itSVI = ttm.m_probeSetRowIndex.find(probeSetId);
00265 
00266   // It's given that experiments will contain probes not in the
00267   // translation table. Those are perfectly valid and dealt with
00268   // during translation.
00269   if (itSVI == ttm.m_probeSetRowIndex.end()) {
00270     return;
00271   }
00272 
00273   bool base1OK = CallElement::isWildCardBase(base1);
00274   bool base2OK = CallElement::isWildCardBase(base2);
00275 
00276   for (int i = 0; (i < itSVI->second.size()) && (!base1OK || !base2OK); i++) {
00277 
00278     int row = itSVI->second[i];
00279 
00280     if (!base1OK) {
00281 
00282       if ((ttm.getType() == ADT_TRANSLATION_TABLE_TYPE_DMET3) && (base1 == "0")) {
00283         base1OK = true;
00284       } else if (ttm.m_rows[row][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE)] == base1) {
00285         base1OK = true;
00286       } else if (ttm.m_rows[row][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)] == base1) {
00287         base1OK = true;
00288       }
00289     }
00290     if (!base2OK) {
00291       if ((ttm.getType() == ADT_TRANSLATION_TABLE_TYPE_DMET3) && (base2 == "")) {
00292         base2OK = true;
00293       }
00294       if (ttm.m_rows[row][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE)] == base2) {
00295         base2OK = true;
00296       } else if (ttm.m_rows[row][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)] == base2) {
00297         base2OK = true;
00298       }
00299     }
00300   }
00301 
00302   if (!base1OK) {
00303     std::stringstream msgSStr;
00304     msgSStr << probeSetId << " has unknown chromatid 1 base " << base1 << " not found in translation file.";
00305     if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_ignoreUnknownAlleles) {
00306       Verbose::warn(ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION, msgSStr.str());
00307     } else {
00308       APT_ERR_ABORT(msgSStr.str());
00309     }
00310   } else if (!base2OK) {
00311     std::stringstream msgSStr;
00312     msgSStr << probeSetId << " has unknown chromatid 2 base " << base2 << " not found in translation file.";
00313     if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_ignoreUnknownAlleles) {
00314       Verbose::warn(ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION, msgSStr.str());
00315     } else {
00316       APT_ERR_ABORT(msgSStr.str());
00317     }
00318   }
00319 
00320   return;
00321 }
00322 // end _validateGenotypes
00323 /*****************************************************************************/
00324 /*****************************************************************************/
00325 /**
00326  * GenotypeTableModel::getNextExperiment:
00327  * Synopsis:
00328  *
00329  *  This API is simply a wrapper for
00330  *  TranslationInputStreamTableModel->readNextExperiment.
00331  *
00332  *  Records read in are then scanned again for validation and reformating.
00333  *
00334  *
00335  * @param rte - the single instance RunTimeEnvironment
00336  * @param ttm - the single instance translation table model
00337  * @param geneExperimentCopyNumberCall - the copy "allele" designation per gene
00338  *
00339  * @return - the number of records read.
00340  */
00341 /*****************************************************************************/
00342 int GenotypeTableModel::getNextExperiment(RunTimeEnvironment & rte,
00343     TranslationTableModel & ttm,
00344     const std::map<std::string, std::string> &geneExperimentCopyNumberCall)
00345 {
00346 
00347 
00348   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_profile) {
00349     rte.m_profiles["readNextExperiment"]->begin();
00350   }
00351 
00352   m_geneCopyNumber.clear();
00353   
00354   size_t numRecords = readNextExperiment(rte, ttm, geneExperimentCopyNumberCall, m_geneCopyNumber);
00355 
00356   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_profile) {
00357     rte.m_profiles["readNextExperiment"]->end();
00358   }
00359 
00360   m_geneRowIndex.clear();
00361   m_experimentGenes.clear();
00362 
00363   if (numRecords  > 0) {
00364 
00365     for (int row = 0; row < m_rows.size(); row++) {
00366 
00367       if (row == 0) {
00368         m_experimentName = m_rows[row][GT_EXPERIMENT_INDEX];
00369         m_geneName       = m_rows[row][GT_GENES_INDEX];
00370       }
00371       m_geneRowIndex[m_rows[row][GT_GENES_INDEX]].push_back(row);
00372 
00373       if (m_experimentGenes.count(m_rows[row][GT_GENES_INDEX]) == 0) {
00374         m_experimentGenes.insert(m_rows[row][GT_GENES_INDEX]);
00375       }
00376 
00377       if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling) {
00378         if (m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE1_INDEX] == "Ins") {
00379           m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE1_INDEX] = "INS";
00380         }
00381         if (m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE2_INDEX] == "Ins") {
00382           m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE2_INDEX] = "INS";
00383         }
00384         if (m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE1_INDEX] == "Del") {
00385           m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE1_INDEX] = "DEL";
00386         }
00387         if (m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE2_INDEX] == "Del") {
00388           m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE2_INDEX] = "DEL";
00389         }
00390       }
00391 
00392       _validateGenotypes(rte, ttm, m_rows[row][GT_PROBE_SET_INDEX], m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE1_INDEX], m_rows[row][GT_ALLELE2_INDEX]);
00393 
00394 
00395     }
00396   } else {
00397     m_geneName = "";
00398     m_experimentName = "";
00399   }
00400 
00401   return(numRecords);
00402 
00403 }
00404 // end GenotypeTableModel::getNextExperiment
